content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking steps to ensure the safe return of your antique tea set and taking care of it for future generations.

Remember to handle the tea set with care when you pick it up, and inspect it for any damage or signs of wear. If you notice anything unusual, don't hesitate to reach out to a professional conservator or restorer for guidance.

It's also a good idea to consider documenting your tea set, including its history, provenance, and any restoration or conservation work done on it. This can help preserve its value and significance, and make it easier to pass it down to future generations.

Enjoy being reunited with your beautiful antique tea set, and happy collecting!
